root.name: Beatmania GB
root.description: OverviewBeatmania GB was released in Japan on March 11, 1999 for the Game Boy Color.It did not use any special controller, so it used the d-pad as the keyboard and the start button as the turntable.The game contains 10 songs selected from 2ndMix, 3rdMix and Yebisu Mix as well as 10 more original tracks.
